column4: if I install wine, does it open up Ubuntu to any security risks?
Wine can get windows viruses if your wondering
so by using wine, I can infect my ubuntu?
Wine can get infected not Ubuntu
if Wine gets infected you can just reinstall it
how will I know if its infected?
you just have to figure it out. Different virusses have different effects
you are joking, right?  I have to figure it out? lol
how does a noob average user have any idea if it has a virus? lol
its just like telling if Windows has a virus
most ppl dont know they have a virus
are you pulling my chain mate?
are you a noob like I am? :)  most virus are not detected, unless a SCAN reveals it.
You can get AVG for Ubuntu if you want
